tool.name: Delete an Apollo record

param.name: ask_one
param.label: Are you SURE you want to do this?
param.help: It will PERMANENTLY delete all of the features on this organism.

param.name: ask_two
param.label: Are you really, really SURE you want to do this?
param.help: There's NO coming back from this.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Deletes every single one of the annotations on an organism. Intentionally.
**Why?**
There are legitimate uses for this tool, generally re-opened genomes is a good one. Needing to transfer annotations from one build of an organism to another (with the same refseq name).
@REFERENCES@
